name: Tank Warfare: War Tanks
description:
Dive into the world of battles:
*PVP battles 7x7
*Different battle modes
*29advanced crawler and wheeled tanks
*Realistic combat arenas that represent different geographical zones
*Possibility to take into battle up to 12 tanks

Complete, get and learn:
*Tank development tree
*Unique rewards for contributing to the development of the community


You'll get:
*Realistic physics
*Excellent graphics and sound
*Destructible environments
*Attention to detail
*Participation in the life of the project and the community
